text: An new'Billy on the Street'features the cast of'This Is Us.'( Photo : David S. Holloway, truTV ) The Pearsons are hitting the streets. In a new video from Billy on the Street, enthusiastic host Billy Eichner is joined by cast members from NBC's hit This Is Us. Viewers are treated to two members of the Big Three — Chrissy Metz and Justin Hartley — and their TV parents, Mandy Moore and Milo Ventimiglia. We're just going to assume Randall, aka Sterling K. Brown, is off with Beth and the kids on a magical summer vacay. During their ambush, they ran into some avid fans and some less - than - zealous folks.
